title: Surviving the Attention Economy
excerpt: Every app on your phone was designed by people who understand psychology better than you understand yourself. Here's how to fight back.
author: Marco Bellini

title: The Case for Morning Rituals
excerpt: What you do in the first hour after waking sets the trajectory for everything that follows. Make it intentional.
author: Marco Bellini

title: The Deep Work Myth
excerpt: Cal Newport was right about deep work. But most people implement it wrong. Here's what actually matters.
author: Marco Bellini

title: Creative Blocks Are Attention Problems
excerpt: You don't have a creativity problem. You have an attention problem. Here's how to distinguish between them.
author: Marco Bellini

title: Consistency Beats Intensity Every Time
excerpt: Stop trying to have perfect days. Start trying to have many mediocre ones in a row.
author: Marco Bellini
